name: bitterbrush

a bush with yellow flowers that grows in the west of North America: Bitterbrush thrives in arid conditions so you will see lots of it in the Californian desert. The land damaged by the wildfires has been replanted with sagebrush and bitterbrush.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hillsides were dotted with bitterbrush.The wedge-shaped, three-lobed leaves of the bitterbrush can vary in colour from grey-green to bright green.Bitterbrush can usually be found on open, well-drained flatlands, slopes, and valleys with rocky soil.
